Group.Name: TG - ICMS extract from Spark to ESB
Group.Notes: This Task Group uses the ICMS extract from Spark which MOVEit transfers to the ESB server

Group.Name: Chorus - BI CDW Task group V2
Chorus - B2B Emulator
Group.Notes:
2-Task sets for each Chorus Environment: first to MOVE JSON configuration files from Chorsu G Drive to appropriate ESB server, reporting by email on any unexpected files second to take output file(s) from the associated Mule application and send an email based on the name(s) of files found which represents the results of the Mule processing of the JSON configuration files
Planned "go-live" on 2015-07-15

Info.Notes:
Scheduled time changed from 02:00 to 04:00 due to a weekly problem (evident on Tuesdays) when Spark (formerly Telecom) do not present the files until over an hour later. R12 Problem 3042380 Files STILL not present on a Tuesday morning even running 2 hours later. Amended retry count to be 12 (a little over an hour) in the hope that Spark can get the files done in that time. P3-3092128; sup-520180 2014-10-13, sup-520180: Undocumented changes made to this Task's Schedule for it to run at 08:00 AND 09:00 AS WELL AS 06:00 have been removed, so it's just Scheduled at 06:00 with altered Retry count increased from 12 to 60, with the 5 minute retry period covers from initial commencement at 06:00 until 11:00.
10/02/2015 - Appended 'OLD' to task name as this would be superseded by a new version which does additional step (that is, copy to ESB server)

Info.Notes: Modified to retry after 10 minutes for 3 hours after the commencement of the job if the source files are not found. Removed the 11:00 scheduled re-run of the task. ** Changed by: RJW (sup-520180) on 2014-06-19 as a result of failures (e.g. P3 2994087) Changed scheduled run from 01:00 to 02:50 as one or other of the files' transfers to the destination have failed for some transient access reason. Also modified files filter to ensure that both .ctl AND .dat files are processed together and reverted to "default" retries so task will not linger. ** Changed by: RJW (sup-520180) on 2014-07-11 as a result of failures (e.g. P3 3050676)

Task.Name: Chorus - Product Extract - ICMS to sharedint (PROD) Advanced

Info.Notes: Modified to retry after 10 minutes for 3 hours after the commencement of the job if the source files are not found. Removed the 11:00 scheduled re-run of the task. ** Changed by: RJW (sup-520180) on 2014-06-19 as a result of failures (e.g. P3 2994087) Changed scheduled run from 01:00 to 02:50 as one or other of the files' transfers to the destination have failed for some transient access reason. Also modified files filter to ensure that both .ctl AND .dat files are processed together and reverted to "default" retries so task will not linger. ** Changed by: RJW (sup-520180) on 2014-07-11 as a result of failures (e.g. P3 3050676)

Info.Notes: Every day the (default Source) credentials are rejected by the Source (MOVEit Central Internal) for this task. A "Special case" version with no schedule but otherwise identical details runs fine at whatever time it is run so I suspect that there is a block on the Source to logins at this time but nobody has adapted the scheduled tiome to work around it. This task never transfers any files so a failure will quite likely not be noticed. 2014-12-03: sup-520180 (RJW): Changed schedule from 02:00 to 03:00 every day. Fed up seeing failures every day, probably when the Source is engaged in backups. Perhaps they will have finished by 03:00.
